content.title: Intro
content.content: -enca (from root NEK) is a Quenya suffix meaning "without, -less".[1]

content.title: Examples
content.content: There is no canonical word with this suffix, but Helge Fauskanger created a neologism that can be used as an example: nostarenca ("parent-less, orphaned").[2]

content.title: References
content.content:
↑ J.R.R. Tolkien, "Words, Phrases and Passages in Various Tongues in The Lord of the Rings: Eldarin Roots and Stems", in Parma Eldalamberon XVII (edited by Christopher Gilson), p.167
↑ Paul Strack, "ᴺQ. nostarenca n.", Eldamo - An Elvish Lexicon (accessed 2 May 2019)
